Commands.Hyper Jump: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Jump Gear for 2 turns and turns BRV Attack to Boost Jump.  Jump Gear raises Attack and Max BRV.
Commands.Boost Jump: 1-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.
Commands.Dragon Dive: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Dragon Gear for 2 turns and turns HP Attack to Dragon.  Dragon Gear raises Attack and Max BRV.
Commands.Dragon: Moderately restores HP up to 15% of Max HP after the HP attack.  Low Action Delay.
Commands.Big Brawl: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack repeated 7 times.  The BRV+HP attacks are randomly dispersed if there are multiple targets.

Passives.Hyper Jump Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Hyper Jump.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Dragon Dive Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Dragon Dive.
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Hyper Jump Charge: Increases the max uses of Hyper Jump by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Dragon Dive Charge: Increases the max uses of Dragon Dive by 1.
Passives.The Captain's Bark: Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds Max HP, 50% of the excess is divided amongst allies.The healing value is limited to 10% of each target's Max HP.
Passives.Jump Gear Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while Jump Gear is active.
Passives.Hyper Jump Extend: Increases Hyper Jump's max uses by 2.When using Hyper Jump:- Turns to a 3-HIT AoE BRV attack.- Slightly raises its total potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack on the main target after use.- Extends the duration of Jump Gear by 1 turn.When using Boost Jump:- Turns to a 2-HIT AoE BRV attack.- Slightly raises its total potency.
Passives.Dragon Gear Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while Dragon Gear is active.
Passives.Dragon Dive Extend: Increases Dragon Dive's max uses by 1.When using Dragon Dive:- Turns to a 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.- Tremendously raises its total potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Extends the duration of Dragon Gear by 1 turn.When using Dragon:- Inflicts a Wind-elemental ranged BRV attack before the HP attack.

Weapons.Slash Lance CP: 15: Increases the potency of Hyper Jump and Boost Jump.Improves the effects of Jump Gear and extends its duration.
Weapons.Javelin CP: 35: Increases Dragon Dive's potency and allows it to remove one buff from the target.Increases Dragon Dive's max uses by 1.Improves the effects of Dragon Gear and extends its duration.Raises the HP recovery limit of Dragon.
Weapons.Mast Ax CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Big Brawl.
